item.title: [317] Delta: Adding emotes to items :Delta [317]
item.dc:creator: @boombaklat boombaklat
item.description:
@boombaklat wrote:

Well i seen a server with a cape which when you wore you flew and i wanted to put this on my sevrer so i tried

i used the code:-
under: public int GetWalkAnim(int id)

if(id == 12114) // wngs
{
return 1501;
}

and :-
under: public int GetStandAnim(int id)

if(id == 12113) // wings
{
return 1501;
}

But theirs been no errors, just whenever i wore the cape it doesnt work.

Anyone able to help me out?

Thank you,

Read full topic
